name: weavescope
description:
Live visualisation, monitoring and management

Weave Scope produces a live interactive map of your containerized services and applications with no coding and no instrumentation
preInstallNotes: This DC/OS Service is currently in preview.
postInstallNotes:
Have fun monitoring, visualising and managing you containers with Weave Scope!

You also need to install `weavescope-probe` package.

You can access Weave Scope at
 **`https://<dcos_url>/service/weavescope/`**

More documentation can be found on [Weaveworks website](http://weave.works/deploy-scope-on-dcos).
